title: Identity of Noida Coronavirus patient revealed? Here’s the fact check | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
News has been circulating online revealing the identity of the Coronavirus victim from Delhi-NCR who had tested positive.

Some of the posts claim his name, occupation, age etc. The post states that his name is Rohit Dutta. He is a 45-year-old resident of Mayur Vihar II and his travel history as well as his phone number.

The similar post was also found on Facebook;

‘Only Real Stories’ on March 3rd, 2020 posted a video on YouTube that carries the same information.

We fact-checked the above information and found it to be unconfirmed.

A Google search shows no official media source reporting this exact information. A Google image search of the above image also reveals no information on anyone named Rohit Dutta.

Hence there is no credibility to this news, it should not be believed.

If you want to fact-check any story, WhatsApp it now on +91 88268 00707
